original_text: Now Amnon had an adviser named Jonadab son of Shimeah, David’s brother. Jonadab was a very shrewd man.
korean_text: 암논에게 요나답이라 하는 친구가 있으니 그는 다윗의 형 시므아의 아들이요 심히 간교한 자라

sentences.original_text: Now Amnon had an adviser named Jonadab
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 암논은 요나답이라는 조언자를 두고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: Jonadab was a very shrewd man
